item.title: What’s your favorite first sign of Spring?? Mine is buds on trees! If you’re heading out for your own Bud Watch Run (or any run), make sure to keep your feet comfy with a pair of @adidas Supernova Rise 2.0 👟They really are like couches for your feet becau

item.title: The Brooks Chaser 5” Shorts have been redesigned and they did not score as high as the original; HOWEVER, the 7” version is guaranteed to be a safer bet. Even tugging this pair down a tiny bit was a massive improvement. The price is $65. I love that they

item.title: Some workouts and runs just have to be forced especially during the latter stages of marathon training 🫠 hope these tips help 🫡 #running #marathontraining #runlife

item.title: The amount I struggled with this tells me I need to be doing MORE Pilates but I will make sure I select a BEGINNER class next time because this was intermediate. All the strength training I’ve been doing for months did not prepare me for this. #beginnerf

item.title: I would LOVE to out-weird the other Webby Award nominees (especially nutter butter 😤). I’m super grateful to be a nominee in @The Webby Awards “weird social” category and would be even MORE grateful if you could vote for me 🤓 (check my profile) 📸 @steviec

item.title: I was caught off guard by these @Sprints Running shorts because the hill test usually takes out 90% of shorts I try. If you want these to be looser fitting, definitely size up because these are large and I usually wear medium or large for a looser fit. I’

item.title: Make it make sense? Sorry that’s above my pay grade. This was my last long run before London marathon so hope it did something 🫠 #running #girlmath

item.title: I always had to turn around a 1/2 mile from my house when I started running. Now gearing up to hopefully finish my fourth marathon in London?! Wild. Only a couple weeks left 😮‍💨 #jogging #motivation #beforeandafter

item.title: This happened last week so I’m at the end of my week of rest. Is it better? I don’t know 🫣 Will I still run the London Marathon? Your guess is as good as mine 🫠 #running #runner #runlife

item.title: What just happened?! The Boston Marathon weekend flew by and was filled with amazing Adidas events, cheering for runners, and lots of inspiring moments I will take with me to London! Huge thanks to @adidas for the best Boston Marathon weekend to date 🙌 #p

item.title: I love pigeons and I love London. My body is sore from the marathon yesterday but we still went out and did tourist things today. This area had pigeons, ducks, herons, even baby chicks 🥹🥹🥹 #londonmarathon #tourist #london
item.description: I love pigeons and I love London. My body is sore from the marathon yesterday but we still went out and did tourist things today. This area had pigeons, ducks, herons, even baby chicks 🥹🥹🥹 #londonmarathon #tourist #london

item.title: I went down a rabbit hole and now my fyp is filled with this discourse also not giving people the shoes she promised is icing on a really weird cake I will be talking about this on my podcast

item.title: I’m just a self sabotaging queen who likes to live on the edge and gets lucky when nothing bad happens 😈 Don’t do as I do do as you do 🫡 #runners #runcommunity #marathon
item.description: I’m just a self sabotaging queen who likes to live on the edge and gets lucky when nothing bad happens 😈 Don’t do as I do do as you do 🫡 #runners #runcommunity #marathon

item.title: A guaranteed bib to a world major marathon like the TCS London Marathon is nearly impossible to come by, but you can make that happen right now just by pre-registering through @Sports Tours USA 🙌 I’ve been telling everyone I talk to about my experience ru

item.title: If you finished the London Marathon this year, you are a Guinness World Record holder! I ordered this certificate and will be hanging it in my podcast studio so everyone can be reminded of my exceptional accomplishment 🤭 #runcommunity #runners #marathon
item.description: If you finished the London Marathon this year, you are a Guinness World Record holder! I ordered this certificate and will be hanging it in my podcast studio so everyone can be reminded of my exceptional accomplishment 🤭 #runcommunity #runners #marathon

item.title: Replying to @Sarah 🪩 I knew from experience these shorts would not ride up my thighs. It was the one thing I was sure of on marathon day 😮‍💨 NOTE: these are the 9” length! #shorts #shortsforwomen #running

item.title: The dress code says “look sharp in whatever feels comfortable to you” what does that even mean? The event is two days in NYC not running related if you guys don’t help me I’m not going 😤 #helpme #fashion #tryingnewthings
item.description: The dress code says “look sharp in whatever feels comfortable to you” what does that even mean? The event is two days in NYC not running related if you guys don’t help me I’m not going 😤 #helpme #fashion #tryingnewthings

item.title: It’s shorts gobbling season! I’m focusing on flowy shorts because i have to wear spandex while running so i want my skin to breathe when i’m not running ok thanks. We’re kicking things off with the @Reebok running shorts 🩳 #shortsreview #thickthighproblem
item.description: It’s shorts gobbling season! I’m focusing on flowy shorts because i have to wear spandex while running so i want my skin to breathe when i’m not running ok thanks. We’re kicking things off with the @Reebok running shorts 🩳 #shortsreview #thickthighproblem

item.title: Two laps doesn’t sound like a lot until you try to SPRINT IT! Is my sprint equal to Bryce’s jog? Yes. Did that make it any easier? No. Not shown in the video are my lungs that burned for 5 hours after finishing this run 😮‍💨 I’ll be finishing up the Hepta
item.description: Two laps doesn’t sound like a lot until you try to SPRINT IT! Is my sprint equal to Bryce’s jog? Yes. Did that make it any easier? No. Not shown in the video are my lungs that burned for 5 hours after finishing this run 😮‍💨 I’ll be finishing up the Hepta

item.title: As a professional struggle runner, I have all the pro tips. No more 🍕 in leggings pockets! This goes for spaghetti too! Real pros put them in their hoodies. Hoodie: @Scrappockets
item.description: As a professional struggle runner, I have all the pro tips. No more 🍕 in leggings pockets! This goes for spaghetti too! Real pros put them in their hoodies. Hoodie: @Scrappockets
